reqs: Seats in the course are restricted to students in the MPPGA program. This course is taught in Room 351 in the C.K. Choi Building, 1855 West Mall, UBC.
description: Energy sources, markets, and impacts critical to energy policy, including oil, natural gas and coal markets; electricity and utilities policy; local and global environmental impacts; renewable energy; nuclear power and security; energy efficiency; technological innovation; and energy poverty.
